base_description: Metallic faucet set with classic design.
part_description: Includes curved spout and two separate handles; spout is central, handles are symmetrically placed on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control water flow through the spout. Turning the handles adjusts internal valves, regulating water temperature and pressure. The spout channels combined water to the outlet.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with plumbing to deliver water. Users operate handles to adjust water flow and temperature. Can be installed on sinks or countertops, interacting with surrounding fixtures and surfaces.
